option.label: Safe Scratch Timeout (ms) (20ms is the minimum allowed)
Use :hwbtn:`Play` instead of :hwbtn:`Shift` + :hwbtn:`Play` to brake/soft start.
Soft Start Time (Higher is faster) (disable with -1)
Show beats instead of rotation in the center red lights.
Do not send Serato mode keep-alive when enabled. Note that center lights, spin alignment and slip flash will not be available.

control.description: Open/close selected left List, Knob: SHIFT & BROWSER
Shift + Volume Up play song on channel 1
Shift + Volume Up play song on channel 2
Shift + Volume Up play song on channel 3
Shift + Volume Up play song on channel 4
